Name: CrateTastrophe
About the game: Demo now available! Try a over two dozen levels of CrateTastrophe for free! The Demo passed 6500 downloads! 谢谢所有中国球员！ Tournament is now live! Read more at Events and Announcements! In CrateTastrophe you play as the guard , tasked with the dreary job of keeping watch on an old, secret, army hangar. When suddenly crates start to fly around you draw your gun and the mayhem begins! From the classic First-Person-Shooter perspective solve puzzles presented by the various crate types and their effects on each other when destroyed. Use quick wits as the timer is constantly clicking down! Gain new weapons with increasing destructive capabilities as you shoot your way through hundreds of game levels, spanning areas of the hangar, surrounding industrial area, the countryside and more. The crates you destroy are counted as currency, which can be used in the store to gain ammo, lives, new gun sights and most importantly - brand new weapons! Unlock achievement by preforming everything from the mundane to the craziest tricks and pinnacle of bullet spraying. Score higher and higher points as you push forward - these points will unlock early access for expert players to the Challenge Mode , where new achievements and challenges await. Additionally, show your high score with great pride on our leaderboards, where the best of the best fight to claim the number one spot!
